name: EU FAMÍLIA (I FAMILY)
description:
We see right away a large elephant, a symbol of fertility in the affective relationship between mammals, part of it already connected to a whole system of little pieces and gears mixed with various plants and even a DNA helix bringing the reflection of how we are part of this system and how we broke up these patterns, we have a little mouse with a box in his hand, but do we notice that he is out of this system already helping to deconstruct what was foreseen or would it be rebuilding with new ideas? We see some eyes scattered throughout the image considering that we are always being watched, by cameras throughout the city, whether by computers and cell phones, or even by beings who are not incarnated. We are faced again with the creation from a seed that resembles a vagina, from which the fluid of life is born, giving rise to a pine cone, pine, pine or pineal, generating the connection with the planetary energy field and generating a baby, who does it have its umbilical cord connected to the cosmos, does this bird and this child meditating have to do with this line of reasoning, how light is the created being being all the time observed and judged with eyes everywhere?

Year: 2018 | Technique: Black pen on paper

This artwork is from a limited edition of 10 prints
Printed in UltraChrome HD mineral pigment - Epson
297x420 mm Hahnemühle Museum Etching 350g
Wagner Possati - Brazil - São Paulo 2020

3508x4961pixels | .jpg | 96dpi | 11.9 MB

This art is part of a collection of 4 works released by Galeria Visionariom Art.
This NFT was generated as a gift from a physical work.
www.visionariom.com
